traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The ophidian has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

actions.name: Snake Hands
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 hour.

actions.name: Blinding Spray. (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: The ophidian spews forth a 20-foot cone of viscous liquid. All creatures in this area must succeed on a DC 12 Dexterity saving or be blinded for 1 minute. The blinded target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
